name: go-icemulti-root
description: Go(lang) tools to exploit warm/cold boot in iCE40 FPGAs (root)
author: go-icemulti contributors

scripts.fmt-all: cd api && gofmt -s -w . && cd ../cli && gofmt -s -w . && cd ../lib && gofmt -s -w .
scripts.dev: cd app && yarn build && cd ../doc && hugo && mv public ../app/dist/doc && cd ../api && go run main.go -v -p 8080 -d ../app/dist
